titleStmt.title: The honorable historie of Frier Bacon, and Frier Bongay As it was lately plaid by the Prince Palatine his Seruants. Made by Robert Greene, Master of Arts.

titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Elizabeth Allde dwelling neere Christ-Church,
